mapper.insert: insert into FUNDUNIT_BASICINFOMATION (SERIALNO, FUNDUNITNAME, FUNDUNITSTATUS, INPUTDATE, UPDATEUSERID, UPDATEDATE, INPUTUSERID, INPUTORGID, UPDATEORGID, FUNDUNITNO, COMPANY, WEIGHT, VALIDDATE, INVALIDDATE, QUOTAMODE, LENDERS, TEMPSAVEFLAG, CHANGEFLAG ) values (#{serialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundunitname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundunitstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputorgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateorgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundunitno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invaliddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quotamode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lenders,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tempsaveflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changeflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select SERIALNO, FUNDUNITNAME, FUNDUNITSTATUS, INPUTDATE, UPDATEUSERID, UPDATEDATE, INPUTUSERID, INPUTORGID, UPDATEORGID, FUNDUNITNO, COMPANY, WEIGHT, VALIDDATE, INVALIDDATE, QUOTAMODE, LENDERS, TEMPSAVEFLAG, CHANGEFLAG from FUNDUNIT_BASICINFOMATION where SERIALNO = #{serialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
